author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
evening mist glides beneath
an Elysian glow of the sun
to settle in silence
over lush green growth-
this cemetery takes on a
soft, ethereal glow to accompany
my lost, spectral steps;
i've wandered here for years
welcoming new souls 
to the darkness that waits..
~

#amwriting

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
How we turn
these cobalt veins- 
A murderers' compliance
Redeem beneath the glare
  of flames
The soldiers blame
The politicians game
The people's shame

Now we run, blind-folded
Into a molded cave of ghosts-
We are lost to the wailing..
~
#amwriting #horrorprompt 707 #turn https://t.co/Co5xtGgiJH

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~

blood colored clouds fall
from grace my tragic dreams are
subterranean...

~

#amwriting #haikuhorrorprompt 275 #vsshorror

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
In his presumptuous hunger
  he wore her like a pendant-
  sinister implications..

Dark offerings to
  her darker senses &
  forbidden intentions,
His sacrificial blood to cover
  her hands..touch her lips..
To make her his own in death,
   but never in life...
~
#amwriting https://t.co/jL76w0qt8O

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~

Blaze me in your blue lightning-
Your hands..could it be magic..?
This world isn't prepared for
    the razing of its ruin
Gaze upon this life..set it free...

~
#amwriting #5lines #MacabreWords  📷Pinterest https://t.co/8EWWSm8zOo

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
innocent moments, so fleeting
my heart broke in a crush of reality
   words fell like blows to my face
   which would forever be shadowed

stop blaming the children for your downfall
they never asked for your faults-
watch them grow, uttering the sickness
    of their world..
~

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
Remaining steadfast & rooted
No matter whatever sort of foul
  Abomination
The world claims me to be-
No shame in these pagan beliefs
I am of this universe
The Earth made me..
~
#amwriting #CrowCalls 
#earth #pagan #rooted 
#EarthDay https://t.co/VFe9cEtapi

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
Skin was peeled off slow..in an obscene
   kind of way-
Bare the muscles..the veins popping..
Warm, sensuous feel of blood spreading-
   covering your hands..
Then you snap the bones..small ones first..
   one at a time if they're still screaming..
~
#amwriting #horrorprompt703 https://t.co/OlW5zcrHfc

ascension began
reclaimed madness that towers
its burnt ribs above..

~
